Professor Goodwin,

I found a discrepancy between Cantera (I'm looking at rather 
old ver.1.5.5) and descriptions in "Chemically reacting 
flow" book and I'm wondering if what you did is your intention.

In TransportFactory.cpp, 
TransportFactory::makePolarCorrections method,
I see
xi = 1.0 + 0.25 * alpha_star * mu_p_star * mu_p_star *
              sqrt(tr.eps[kp]/tr.eps[knp]);

However, in Kee's book p.500, Eqn.(12.40), mu is multiplied 
only once.  It seems this doesn't make much difference in 
the result though.

Thanks,
Kazuo Sone
